description:
About us

Neue Cosmetic Company Inc. is a small business in San Dimas, CA. We are professional, collaborative, innovative and our goal is to meeting the toughest skincare challenges.


Our work environment includes:

• Modern office setting

• Growth opportunities

• International workforce

• Relaxed atmosphere

• Casual work attire

• Flexible working hours


• We are a small cosmetic company specialized in cosmeceutical skin care products. We bring advanced technology to cosmetic area to help people fulfill their individual skin care needs. This position would be responsible for management of full supply chain, from manufacturing to product retail and wholesale.


Essential Functions:

• Order raw materials and packaging materials as required through direct contact with suppliers.

• Coordinate and communicate with cosmetic OEM company, third party warehousing company and shipping company.

• Maintain and develop new supplier relationships, evaluating their performance based on costs and on-time delivery.

• Manage the internal supply chain, communicating to the business any of out of stock or delayed materials and ensure that all relevant parties have timely and accurate information available. Tracking deliveries of shipments, and working daily with the production team.

• Adjust and improve supply parameters to optimize inventory levels vs cost trade offs.

• Participate in Purchasing and/or supply chain improvement programs, adding creativity to the existing processes. Excess and Obsolete review and actions.

• Any other task assigned by supervisor or management.


Education Required:

• Bachelor degree, preferably in business, engineering, or supply chain management PREFERRED, but not required. Adequate experience can suffice in place of degree.


Skills and Qualifications Required:

• In-depth knowledge of Purchasing and Supply chain functions in cosmetic industry; International as well as local supply chain knowledge for cosmetic industry.

• Outstanding interpersonal skills requiring the ability to both interact and influence through both verbal and written communication.

• Ability to work in both structured and often unstructured environments to achieve goals and implement ideas.

• Strong sense of urgency.

• Proactive and continual improvement mindset.

• Highly developed analytical skills and demonstrated track record of translating analysis to process solutions.

• Strong sense of flexibility in your work, ability to juggle multiple responsibilities and priorities.


Preferred Qualifications:

• Multi-Lingual

• Prior experience in cosmetic industry

• Experience in a start-up organization

• Expertise with Microsoft Office Suite. Experience Required

• 1-3 years in procurement of packaging and raw materials for the personal care and/or cosmetics industries


Note: This job description is not intended to be all-inclusive. The employee may perform other related duties as negotiated to meet the ongoing needs of the organization.


Job Type: Full-time


Pay: $25.00 - $35.00 per hour


Benefits:

Flexible schedule


Schedule:

8 hour shift

  • Work Location: In person
